member.name: M:ELProjectsApp.Modules.Organizations.Presentation.Controllers.OrganizationsController.GetOrganizations
member.summary: Get organizations belonging to the currently user session.
member.response: An object with all the organizations belonging to the user.

member.name: M:ELProjectsApp.Modules.Organizations.Presentation.Controllers.OrganizationsController.GetOrganizationById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get an user organization by identifier.
member.response: An object related to the organization information.
A message indicating the organization was not found.

member.name: M:ELProjectsApp.Modules.Organizations.Presentation.Controllers.OrganizationsController.CreateOrganization(ELProjectsApp.Modules.Organizations.Presentation.Requests.OrganizationCreationRequest)
member.summary: Create an organization assigned to the current user in session.
member.response: An object indicating the creation was sucessfully.
